tool_input.old_string:
# Run CLI with tree format
        result = subprocess.run(
            ['tdd-toc', temp_file, '--format=tree'],
            capture_output=True,
            text=True,
            check=True
        )
tool_input.new_string:
# Run CLI with tree format
        result = subprocess.run(
            ['md-toc', temp_file, '--format=tree'],
            capture_output=True,
            text=True,
            check=True
        )
